property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, if they cast four or more spells this turn, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adrian Majkrzak

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, add {U}{B}{R}. When you set this scheme in motion, if you control six or more lands, you may search your library for a card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Zack Stella

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) As you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. Creatures the chosen player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may tap any number of untapped creatures they control with total power 8 or greater. If they do, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dan Scott

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put the cards in that pile into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Nils Hamm

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token and prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain is a delusion of the weak. I'll demonstrate."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Titus Lunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let me unburden you of these fatuous hopes."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mathias Kollros

card.name: For Each of You, a Gift

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My generosity blesses you all, even the undeserving."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Marco Nelor

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, up to one target opponent can't attack with creatures, up to one target opponent can't cast creature spells, and up to one target opponent can't cast noncreature spells. You can't choose any player as a target more than once.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anthony Palumbo

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To think you've spent years honing your body only to die like this."

property.name: Artist
property.value: David Gaillet

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. That player loses 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cry out for your comrades so that they may join you in misery."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Volkan Baga

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) At the beginning of your end step, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may sacrifice two creatures. If they do, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Seb McKinnon

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Whenever you set a non-ongoing scheme in motion, you may abandon this scheme. If you do, set that scheme in motion again.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Groveling already? I'm just starting to enjoy myself."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Argyle

card.name: No One Will Hear Your Cries

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent chooses a creature they control, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your companions were lucky to have died first."

property.name: Artist
property.value: McLean Kendree

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control six or more lands, each opponent sacrifices another creature.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Aaron Miller

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, draw three cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn. If you control six or more lands, you may cast up to three spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Christine Choi

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gates open to my new era."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yeong-Hao Han

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals 3 damage to up to one target creature. Create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dunes smell spilled blood."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tomasz Jedruszek

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Little insects, I have created entire worlds and extinguished twice as many."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Min Yum

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls and untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Vow your allegiance to true power."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Argyle

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent exiles the top card of their library. You may cast any number of spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't fret, infants. It wouldn't have worked anyway."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yohann Schepacz
